home.heroSubtitle: Professional beauty services, systematic education programs, and high-quality beauty devices. Discover all beauty solutions at 2ndBrush.

home.eyebrowDesc: From semi-permanent tattoos to retouching and removal, we create perfect eyebrow lines.
home.skincareDesc: Customized skincare services from basic care to intensive care for problem skin.
home.scalpDesc: Complete natural and perfect hairline with hairline correction and density enhancement.

home.testimonial2: "The education program is systematic and has a lot of content that can be applied directly to practice, so it was helpful."
home.testimonial3: "Online booking is convenient, and the quality of the device I purchased is really good. I recommend it!"

education.heroSubtitle: Realize your dream of becoming a beauty professional with systematic curriculum and practical training.
education.coursesSubtitle: Customized step-by-step education from beginners to professionals
education.benefitsSubtitle: We cultivate skilled professionals with our differentiated education system
education.successSubtitle: Stories of graduates who achieved their dreams with 2ndBrush education
education.ctaSubtitle: Realize your dream of becoming a professional with 2ndBrush
education.certificationDesc: Upon completion of all courses, we issue an official 2ndBrush certificate.
education.smallClassDesc: Individual care is possible with a small class of up to 8 students per instructor.
education.practicalDesc: We provide practical training that can be applied directly in the field rather than theory.
education.basicDesc: Basic course for beginners in the beauty industry. Learn systematically from theory to practice.
education.advancedDesc: Advanced course for basic course graduates. Acquire professional skills and know-how.
education.startupDesc: Comprehensive course for professionals aiming for independent business. Learn everything from skills to management.
education.oneDayDesc: One-day completion class that you can participate in without burden even during busy schedules.
education.review1: "I learned systematically through the startup course and now successfully run a shop. Thank you so much!"
education.review2: "I learned step by step from basics to advanced and became confident in serving customers."
education.review2Role: Advanced Course Graduate → Employment at Large Shop
education.review3: "I started with a one-day class and now have completed all regular courses. It's really substantial education!"
